title: Dollar General is being built on 17 just past Hampstead.  Question:  are there any plans for other merchants to build here between Hampstead and Surf City as I also see a 10acre site sign says its being sold
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/06/are-there-plans-for-other-stores-between-hampstead-and-surf-city-in-addition-to-the-dollar-general-on-us-17/
